docTitle.titlePart: Status and recent results of the ANTARES experiment

byline.affiliation:
Commissariatà l'´ energie atomique et auxénergies alternatives
Institut de recherche sur les lois fondamentales de l'Univers

front.div:
The ANTARES neutrino telescope located in the Mediterranean Sea has been
fully installed in 2008. As examples for the ongoing physics studies, we discuss
the search for a high energy excess over the atmospheric neutrino flux leading to
significant limits on the diffuse astrophysical neutrino flux in the multi TeV to
PeV range. Using data taken during the construction phase of the experiment,
an analysis searching for point-like excesses in the neutrino sky distribution
has been performed and the atmospheric muon flux has been determined.
front.keyword:
Keywords: ANTARES; neutrino telescope; diffuse flux; point sources; atmo-
spheric muon flux
